title: # 354 - Natasha Leggero, Moshe Kasher & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave with Natasha Leggero and Moshe Kasher! We talk about being a fun dad, the set that made Moshe's career, casual sex, imposter syndrome, and much more! 

Check out Moshe and Natasha's podcast "Endless Honeymoon Podcast" wherever you get your podcasts! 

This episode is brought to you by Vincero Watches. get 15% off when you go to www.vincerowatches.com and use the code "Bert" at checkout. 

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays sunglasses. Use promo code “Bertcast50” for 50% off of two or more items in the shade shop. Go to www.shadyrays.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode Is also brought to you by Figs. Get 15% off of your first purchase by going to www.wearfigs.com and enter my code "Bert" at checkout.

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on sale now! Get your  tickets at www.bertbertbert.com


For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
